description: Best-selling classic Ferrosi pants are the perfect lightweight softshell pant with multiple functional features that make them the best spring/summer weight option for climbing, hiking and multi-sport. Plus, an eco-friendly fabric that is 46% recycled nylon with improved stretch and recovery for multi-day use.
name: Outdoor Research Ferrosi Pants, 36" Inseam - Mens

specs.value: Bluesign® approved - 46% Recycled Nylon, 40% Nylon, 14% Spandex
